title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull & manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model manager) with OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting & themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template: stream Ollama answers over your documents using embeddings.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and streaming support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chatbot UI that talks to local Ollama server via REST.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official CUDA-enabled Docker image for Ollama with runtime GPU flags.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads; supports slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that adds Ollama LLM blocks for summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama API with serde models.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration to inject Ollama service beans into Java apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, completion, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Step-by-step repo showing how to build RAG with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of Ollama tools, libraries, tutorials, and community projects.
